name: OpioidOverdoseAndPoisoningTestsForOpioidsQuantitative
title: Opioid Overdose and Poisoning (Tests for Opioids [Quantitative])
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with Opioid Overdose and Poisoning (quantitative)),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Tests for Opioids;  

LOINC search:  "(EDDP or Nortapentadol or opiate or codeine or morphine or heroin or hydrocodone or hydromorphone or methadone or oxycodone or oxymorphone or fentanyl) (scale:Qn) -cutoff -(property:Zscore) class:drug/tox -hair -meconium -milk -vitreous -interpretation"),(Exclusion Criteria: specimens: hair, meconium, vitreous fluid, milk;  test types: interpretation tests)
